title: 18 Years Analysis of RASFF Notifications on Sudan Dye Adulterated Cases in Palm Oil (2004 to 2022) and the Principles of Techniques for its Detection
content:
Sustainable Food Technol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript

Ernest Teye, Regina Nyorkeh, Edward Ken Essuman, Simon A Haughey, Chris Elliott, Natasha Logan
Palm oil is one of the most widely consumed food products globally. Despite the restriction of Sudan dyes as a food colouring these dyes still feature prominently in palm oil...
